rows.label: tlk41200141_01_msg0001
rows.name:
A Driver brought me here, and before I knew it,
my dad and I had arrived.

rows.label: tlk41200141_01_msg0002
rows.name:
It was so... scary.
My house was burned down,
and my friends...

rows.label: tlk41200141_01_msg0003
rows.name:
They said I can't go back to Iraada Village anymore...
It's so lonely...
